name: Jamaoni
author: Faaiq Ahmed, Sr Web Developer at Arcgate,faaiqsj@gmail.com

sections.description: A simple jamaoni game for wordpress. just place [JAMAONI] in your post and pages.The main concept behind this games is to create any type of figure through blocks.every click on star icon will provide a new block.user can drag & drap that block anywhere on the page. user can change the color of block and can delete unwanted blocks.
sections.installation:
1. Upload jamaoni to /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. put [JAMAONI] in your post or pages.

short_description: This is a simple wordpress game
description: A simple jamaoni game for wordpress. just place [JAMAONI] in your post and pages.The main concept behind this games is to create any type of figure through blocks.every click on star icon will provide a new block.user can drag & drap that block anywhere on the page. user can change the color of block and can delete unwanted blocks.
